TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CollectionSynchronizationCallback(IEnumerable collection, object context, Action accessMethod, bool writeAccess);
.class public auto ansi sealed CollectionSynchronizationCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub CollectionSynchronizationCallback(collection As IEnumerable, context As Object, accessMethod As Action, writeAccess As Boolean)
public delegate void CollectionSynchronizationCallback(IEnumerable ^ collection, System::Object ^ context, Action ^ accessMethod, bool writeAccess);

param.name: collection
param.span: 만든 것 이외의 다른 스레드에서 액세스하는 컬렉션입니다.

span.span: The collection to access on a thread other than the one that created it.
An object used to synchronize the collection.

param.name: accessMethod
param.span: 컬렉션에 대한 작업을 수행하는 메서드의 대리자입니다.

span.span: A delegate to the method that performs the operation on the collection.

param.name: writeAccess
param.span: accessMethod가 컬렉션에 쓰면 이고, 그렇지 않으면 입니다.

span.span: if accessMethod writes to the collection; otherwise, .

summary.span: 크로스 스레드 액세스에 대한 컬렉션을 동기화하는 메서드를 나타냅니다.

span.span: Represent the method that synchronizes a collection for cross-thread access.
